task: Look up the definition and pronunciation of the word \"impeccable\" and also find an example sentence using that word.
Look up the definition and pronunciation of the word \"impeccable\" and also find an example sentence using that word.
user_action: type "impeccable" into the search bar with the placeholder "Search English–Korean" to find the definition, pronunciation, and an example sentence.
observation: The word "impeccable" is defined as "perfect and with no mistakes." The pronunciation is provided in both UK (/ɪmˈpek.ə.bl̩/) and US (/ɪmˈpek.ə.bəl/) formats. An example sentence given is "She speaks impeccable English." Another example is "His manners were impeccable."
